 THE MARTIAL LAW REGULATION NO. 60 (REPEAL) ACT, 1989  
ACT NO. VI OF 1989  
An Act to repeal Martial Law Regulation No. 60  
WHEREAS  it is expedient to repeal martial Law Regulation N o. 60; 
 It is hereby enacted  as follows: — 
 1. Short title and commencement. —(1) This Act may be called the Martial Law Regulation 
No. 60 (Repeal) Act, 1989.  
 (2) It shall come into force at once.  
 2. Repeal of M.L.R. No. 60. —Martial Law Regulation No. 60, regarding Educational 
Institutions in Islamabad Capital Territory, is hereby repealed.
